summary: Highly enthusiastic customer service professional with 15 years client interface experience. Experienced in sales, account management and training. Proven office management and customer service expertise with a track record of driving client satisfaction and revenue.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Read stories to children and taught painting, drawing and crafts; used a variety of materials for learning and imaginative play; created infant, toddler, and preschool play areas; monitored children's activities; provided daily reports; incorporated music and art; escorted children on outings; upheld CPR and Georgia regulations; led reading classes; identified early signs of emotional/developmental issues and communicated with parents; maintained developmentally appropriate environment; implemented positive discipline; supervised circle time and activities; encouraged early literacy; managed housekeeping; built a stable, positive environment for 1-5 year olds; 13 years of childcare experience.

experience.title: Office Manager/Teacher
experience.description: Managed a team of 20 professionals; reduced expenses by implementing QuickBooks; standardized employee training leading to higher customer satisfaction; managed customer engagement campaigns; increased sales by 50% through marketing campaigns; increased conversions; managed inbound and outbound marketing; oversaw in-house advertising; created toddler and preschool play areas; maintained daily activity records; billed and managed 100 client accounts per year; planned weekly menus for 50 children; operated a 9,000-square-foot childcare center; trained 25 employees; upheld CPR and Illinois regulated certifications.
